revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pok√©mon & Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! 300,000 |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- | [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle || rowspan=2| [[File:Beedrill.png|40px]] Beedrill |- | [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=2| [[File:Butterfree.png|40px]] Butterfree |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish |- | [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras || rowspan=2| [[File:Celebi.png|40px]] Celebi*
*(Must be Johto Champion) || rowspan=2|
600,000 |- | [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |} ==Items== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 25% |} [[Category:Dungeons]]
